translate.english: a plate of / a dish of

examples.example: 妈妈精心准备了一盘美味的水果给辛苦工作一天的爸爸。

translate.english: Mother carefully prepared a plate of delicious fruit for father who has worked hard for a whole day.

examples.example: 我端出一盘自己精心制作的糕点与朋友们分享。

translate.english: I brought out a plate of pastries carefully made by myself to share with my friends.

examples.example: 我做了一盘香喷喷的菜肴与家人一起享用。

translate.english: I made a plate of delicious dishes to enjoy with my family.
